## Discussion

This dictionary can be used with [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/HTTPCookie/init(properties:)] (or [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSHTTPCookie/cookieWithProperties:] in Objective-C) to create an equivalent [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/HTTPCookie] object.

See [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/HTTPCookie/init(properties:)] for more information on the constraints imposed on the `properties` dictionary.

# properties

**Instance Property**

The cookie’s properties.

## Declaration

```swift
var properties: [HTTPCookiePropertyKey : Any]? { get }
```

## Discussion

This dictionary can be used with [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/HTTPCookie/init(properties:)] (or [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSHTTPCookie/cookieWithProperties:] in Objective-C) to create an equivalent [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/HTTPCookie] object.

See [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/HTTPCookie/init(properties:)] for more information on the constraints imposed on the `properties` dictionary.

## Accessing cookie properties as key-value pairs

- **HTTPCookiePropertyKey**: Constants that define the supported keys in a cookie attributes dictionary.
